value.0:
On robes, my master recommends specific spells, always with adequate funds and life energy available.

Chain Lightning - To Resist Stronger Electrical Attacks
Darkness - To Become Better Hidden
Ethereal Visage - Robe of Scintillating Colors
Firebrand - To Resist Stronger Fire Attacks
Fox's Cunning - To Improve Wizardly Knowledge
Gust of Wind To Resist Stronger Sonic Attacks
Ice Storm - To Resist Stronger Cold Attacks
Mestil's Acid Breath - To Resist Stronger Acid Attacks
True Seeing - Robe of Seeing Eyes
